content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where url contains "api"
| summarize 
    TotalRequests = count(),
    SuccessRequests = countif(success == true),
    FailedRequests = countif(success == false),
    AvgDuration = round(avg(duration), 2),
    P95Duration = round(percentile(duration, 95), 2)
| extend SuccessRate = round(100.0 * SuccessRequests / TotalRequests, 2)
| project 
    TotalRequests,
    SuccessRate,
    FailedRequests,
    AvgDuration,
    P95Duration
| evaluate narrow()
| extend 
    DisplayName = case(
        Column == "TotalRequests", "üìä Total Requests",
        Column == "SuccessRate", "‚úÖ Success Rate",
        Column == "FailedRequests", "‚ùå Failed Requests",
        Column == "AvgDuration", "‚è±Ô∏è Avg Duration",
        Column == "P95Duration", "üìà P95 Duration",
        Column
    ),
    DisplayValue = case(
        Column == "SuccessRate", strcat(Value, "%"),
        Column == "AvgDuration" or Column == "P95Duration", strcat(Value, " ms"),
        tostring(Value)
    )
| project Column = DisplayName, Value = DisplayValue
content.title: API Performance KPIs
